name: Solitude (LudosGD)
description:
In Solitude, you must navigate a dungeon to find the exit by seeing only one thing at a time.

  • Hold WASD to see the world around you;
  • Use the arrow keys to move;
  • Avoid the red squares and find the door!

This is my entry for the 2019 GMTK Game Jam! Please use Chrome or Firefox to make the browser version work.

Credits:

Music: Brethen, Arise by Chris Zabriskie on freemusicarchive.com

Sound effects: All from freesound.org, except the door sound effects which are taken from GarageBand.

  • 118649__pyzaist__bump by pyzaist
  • 126421__cabeeno-rossley__level-complete by Cabeeno Rossley
  • 164549__adam-n__switch-click-4 by Adam_N
  • 332670__reitanna__low-thump by Reitanna

Thank you very much for playing!
